title: ‘Succession’ S3E2 Precap
description:
Chris and Wos team up to preview Episode 2 of Season 3 of ‘Succession.’ They discuss how certain characters have grown from past seasons, the strategy Shiv utilizes this episode, the new alliances, and what they’re looking forward to in Episode 2.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Wosny Lambre

Associate Producer: Erika Cervantes
